thread.title: Megan McKenna and Pete Wicks reunite for TOWIE after ‘blazing row’ at NTAs
thread.title_full: Megan McKenna and Pete Wicks reunite for TOWIE after ‘blazing row’ at NTAs

author: Jessica Gibb
title: Megan McKenna and Pete Wicks reunite for TOWIE after ‘blazing row’ at NTAs
text:
Megan McKenna and Pete Wicks reunite for TOWIE after ‘blazing row’ at NTAs Looks like the TOWIE couple are back on Share TOWIE in Tenerife (Photo: gemmacollins1/Instagram) Share Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
Megan McKenna has reunited with her boyfriend Pete Wicks after their fall out at the NTAs. 
But after fears the couple’s relationship was in trouble again – the pair have been spotted filming TOWIE in Tenerife together. Read More Is it over? Megan McKenna and Pete Wicks have an epic fight and she promptly Instagram-deletes him Megan McKenna and Peter Wicks (Photo: Rex Features) 
Gemma Collins proved that the couple are at least back on speaking terms as she shared a picture from her birthday meal out in the Spanish isle. 
Megan and Pete are happily seated opposite each other as they’re surrounded by their TOWIE cast mates. 
Last week, Megan struggled to contain her emotions as she left the NTAs in the early hours of the morning. Read More TOWIE couples heading to Tenerife for new series - but will Megan McKenna and Pete Wicks be there? Megan McKenna and Pete Wicks arriving at the National Television Awards 2017 (Photo: PA) 
She was spotted in hysterics and being consoled by a friend after her boyfriend reportedly walked away into the night. 
It's been claimed Pete ignored Megan's cries following a blazing row that saw them at loggerheads. 
The Sun claimed Megan and Pete, who have been dating for almost a year, had a ferocious argument in front of the rest of the TOWIE cast before Megan fled. Megan McKenna arriving at the National Television Awards 2017 (Photo: PA) 
Pete reportedly walked out behind her and was later spotted talking on his phone and ignoring her emotional pleas. 
She has since seemingly deleted all traces of Pete from her social media, although he did appear on her Snapchat last night - presumably before their fight. 
It's not the first time their relationship has felt the strain. Last summer they broke up for a number of weeks after Pete was found to be sexting a string of other women behind Megan's back. 
However, the pair reunited while filming for the TOWIE Marbella special and Pete promised to make things up to her. Like us on Facebook
